commentable_entity.ask: BOYCOTT all Disney films for firing Johnny depp
commentable_entity.title: BOYCOTT all Disney films for firing Johnny depp
commentable_entity.description:
Since the allegations made by amber heard. Disney has fired Johnny Depp from Pirates of the Carribean, this was an unfair and premature choice. Johnny put so much into this character & did so much for children’s hospitals. Disney must feel the full force of this choice. 

I propose boycotting ALL disney films including cancelling Disney + subscriptions for all those in support of Johnny & for the REAL survivors of domestic & sexual abuse. Let’s make a stand #abuseisabuse

Since the allegations made by amber heard. Disney has fired Johnny Depp from Pirates of the Carribean, this was an unfair and premature choice. Johnny put so much into this character & did so much for children’s hospitals. Disney must feel the full force of this choice. 

I propose boycotting ALL disney films including cancelling Disney + subscriptions for all those in support of Johnny & for the REAL survivors of domestic & sexual abuse. Let’s make a stand #abuseisabuse

comment: It's absolutely disgusting how someone can be guilty until proven innocent, after all he's been through. There's PLENTY of evidence against Amber Heard that should have been taken into consideration, BEFORE making a decision to not allow Johnny Depp to do his job. I'm thoroughly disappointed in the injustice. Johnny Depp has been an icon in so many people's lives, and when he needed you the most, you turned your backs. Disney should be ashamed.

comment: He was wrongly dropped from a franchise that drew Disney fans in by the thousands.
commentable_entity.ask: BOYCOTT all Disney films for firing Johnny depp
commentable_entity.title: BOYCOTT all Disney films for firing Johnny depp
commentable_entity.description:
Since the allegations made by amber heard. Disney has fired Johnny Depp from Pirates of the Carribean, this was an unfair and premature choice. Johnny put so much into this character & did so much for children’s hospitals. Disney must feel the full force of this choice. 

I propose boycotting ALL disney films including cancelling Disney + subscriptions for all those in support of Johnny & for the REAL survivors of domestic & sexual abuse. Let’s make a stand #abuseisabuse
